com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcAvPlayer.ResponseListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SmcAvPlayer

    public static interface SmcAvPlayer.ResponseListener
    This listener instance provides callback methods for playback response events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPause(SmcAvPlayer device, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.pause() is received.
      void onPlay(SmcAvPlayer device, SmcItem smcItem, SmcAvPlayer.PlayInfo contentInfo, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.play(SmcItem, com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.SmcAvPlayer.PlayInfo) is received.
      void onRequestMediaInfo(SmcAvPlayer device, SmcAvPlayer.MediaInfo mediaInfo, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestMediaInfo() is received.
      void onRequestMuteInfo(SmcAvPlayer device, boolean onOff, int error)
      Called when the response of SmcAvPlayer.requestMuteInfo() is received.
      void onRequestPlayPosition(SmcAvPlayer device, long position, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestPlayPosition() is received.
      void onRequestStateInfo(SmcAvPlayer device, int state, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestStateInfo() is received.

      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestVolumeInfo() is received.
      void onResume(SmcAvPlayer device, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.resume() is received.
      void onSeek(SmcAvPlayer device, long requestedPosition, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.seek(long) is received.

      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.setMute(boolean) is received.

      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.setVolume(int) is received.
      void onStop(SmcAvPlayer device, int error)
      Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.stop() is received.

    • Method Detail

      • onPlay

        void onPlay(SmcAvPlayer device,
          SmcItem smcItem,
          SmcAvPlayer.PlayInfo contentInfo,
          int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.play(SmcItem, com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.SmcAvPlayer.PlayInfo) is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        smcItem - The audio or video item being played.
        contentInfo - Position in the media clip in seconds from the beginning of the clip.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:

        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onStop

        void onStop(SmcAvPlayer device,
          int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.stop() is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT

        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onSeek

        void onSeek(SmcAvPlayer device,
          long requestedPosition,
          int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.seek(long) is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        requestedPosition - The position the player has moved to in seconds from the beginning of the clip.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE

      • onRequestPlayPosition

        void onRequestPlayPosition(SmcAvPlayer device,
                         long position,
                         int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestPlayPosition() is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        position - The current position in the media clip in seconds from the beginning of the clip. If the request has failed, this is set to -1.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onRequestStateInfo

        void onRequestStateInfo(SmcAvPlayer device,
                      int state,
                      int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestStateInfo() is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        state - The player state. The valid values are:

        • SmcAvPlayer.STATE_STOPPED
        • SmcAvPlayer.STATE_BUFFERING
        • SmcAvPlayer.STATE_PLAYING
        • SmcAvPlayer.STATE_PAUSED
        • SmcAvPlayer.STATE_CONTENT_CHANGED
        • SmcAvPlayer.STATE_UNKNOWN
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onRequestMediaInfo

        void onRequestMediaInfo(SmcAvPlayer device,
                      SmcAvPlayer.MediaInfo mediaInfo,
                      int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestMediaInfo() is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        mediaInfo - Duration of the media clip. If the request has failed, this is set to null.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onRequestVolumeInfo

        void onRequestVolumeInfo(SmcAvPlayer device,
                       int level,
                       int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.requestVolumeInfo() is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        level - The current volume level. If the request has failed, this value is set to -1.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onSetVolume

        void onSetVolume(SmcAvPlayer device,
               int level,
               int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.setVolume(int) is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        level - The volume level after the request has been handled.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST

        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onRequestMuteInfo

        void onRequestMuteInfo(SmcAvPlayer device,
                     boolean onOff,
                     int error)
        Called when the response of SmcAvPlayer.requestMuteInfo() is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        onOff - The current mute status. This is set to true if mute is on. This is set to false if mute is off.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT

      • onSetMute

        void onSetMute(SmcAvPlayer device,
             boolean onOff,
             int error)
        Called when the response for SmcAvPlayer.setMute(boolean) is received.

        Parameters:
        device - The player instance.
        onOff - The mute status after the request has been handled. This is set to true if mute is on. This is set to false if mute is off.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.SUCCESS
        • Smc.ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_UNKNOWN
        • Smc.ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_DEVICE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_STATE
        • Smc.ERROR_INVALID_OBJECT
        • Smc.ERROR_ITEM_NOT_EXIST
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_NO_RESPONSE
        • Smc.ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_TIME_OUT
